import React from 'react' import { useRouteMatch } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Table, TableHead, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableRow, Paper } from '@material-ui/core' const UserView = () => { const users = useSelector(state => state.users) const match = useRouteMatch('/users/:id') const user = match ? users.find(user => user.id === match.params.id) : null if (!user) { return null } return (
added blogs
    {user.blogs.map(blog =>
  • {blog.title}
    •      )}
)} export default UserView
